title: Saint Croix Island International Historic Site: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping          Lodging There is no lodging in the park. Both the towns of Robbinston (4 miles, 6 km) and Calais (8 miles, 13 km) offer several lodging and camping options. For more information contact local chambers of commerce below.         Eating There are no restaurants in the park. The town of Calais (8 miles, 13 km) offers several dining options. For more information, visit the local chambers of commerce below.      Chambers of Commerce For more information on lodging and restaurants contact: Saint Croix Valley Chamber of Commerce Bangor Region Chamber of Commerce City of Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada Eastport Area Chamber of Commerce St. Andrews By-the-Sea, New Brunswick, Canada
